original_text: The Israelites who lived in the Jezreel valley and on the other side of the Jordan River saw what happened. They saw that the Israelite army had run away from the Philistines. They saw that Saul and his sons were dead. So they left their towns and they ran away. Then the Philistines came to live in those towns.
korean_text: 골짜기 저쪽에 있는 이스라엘 사람과 요단 건너쪽에 있는 자들이 이스라엘 사람들이 도망한 것과 사울과 그의 아들들이 죽었음을 보고 성읍들을 버리고 도망하매 블레셋 사람들이 이르러 거기에서 사니라

sentences.original_text: The Israelites who lived in the Jezreel valley
and on the other side of the Jordan River
They saw that the Israelite army had run away
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이스라엘 군대가 도망쳤다는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: They saw that Saul and his sons were dead
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사울과 그의 아들들이 죽었다는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: Then the Philistines came to live in those towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 블레셋 사람들이 그 도시들에 와서 살았다
